titles.title: Requesting the President, and directing the Secretary of State, to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of all documents in their possession referring or relating to certain aspects of the United States withdrawal from Afghanistan.

Requesting the President, and directing the Secretary of State, to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of all documents in their possession referring or relating to certain aspects of the United States withdrawal from Afghanistan.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported Adversely (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 25 - 23.
Reported adversely by the Committee on Foreign Affairs. H. Rept. 117-480.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 102.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary: This resolution requests the President and directs the Secretary of State to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of all documents and other materials, both classified and unclassified, in their possession that refer or relate to certain aspects of the withdrawal from Afghanistan.
